nodes.text: The TKR-R treatment chamber was manufactured during the Old Republic era. When activated, it closed and healed the user.

The TKR-R treatment chamber is a regeneration item that was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 2.4.2 on October 29, 2013. Decorated like a jack-o-lantern, the chamber is named after the traditional Halloween saying "trick or treat," and was a special Halloween-themed item that was only available until November 5.
